pr_title: HIVE-24081: Enable pre-materializing CTEs referenced in scalar subqueries

timeline.message: HIVE-24081: Enable pre-materializing CTEs referenced in scalar subqueries
HIVE-24081: Enable pre-materializing CTEs referenced in scalar subqueries

timeline.bodyText: Should we set the default to 2 now that it is only triggered in very specific cases?
timeline.author: jcamachor

timeline.bodyText: Trying to understand this step. Does this lead to parsing the same subquery multiple times?
timeline.author: jcamachor

replies.bodyText: This step parses the subquery only. It is necessary to collect references to the CTEs in subquery expressions.
replies.author: kasakrisz

timeline.bodyText:
Although the method is evident, could we add a comment?
Should this be static since it is a utility method that can be used beyond this scope?
timeline.author: jcamachor

replies.bodyText: Added javadocs. I think it can be non-static until it is used from another location. It uses the destToSelExpr field located in QBParseInfo.
replies.author: kasakrisz
